articles.title: Thai baht, Malaysian ringgit gain among Asian FX as Omicron worries ease - Reuters
articles.description: Most Asian currencies firmed against the greenback on Thursday, led by the Thai baht and Malaysian ringgit, amid waning concerns about the economic impact of the Omicron coronavirus variant and a slowing Chinese factory-gate inflation.
articles.content: Dec 9 (Reuters) - Most Asian currencies firmed against the greenback on Thursday, led by the Thai baht and Malaysian ringgit, amid waning concerns about the economic impact of the Omicron coronavirus… [+2750 chars]

articles.title: Asia-Pacific markets trade mixed as investors assess omicron risks - CNBC
articles.description: The World Health Organization on Wednesday said the new Covid variant could change the course of the pandemic.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE Asia-Pacific markets traded mixed Thursday as investors assessed risks surrounding the omicron Covid variant.
The Nikkei 225 in Japan declined 0.15% while the Topix index fell 0.29%.

articles.description: There are many ways to show off one's national identity, but some TikTokers have found a better option — by using a soundbite from an American rapper. The viral TikTok soundbite goes, "Cause you're a Singapore boy, or you an island boy". American rapper Flyys…

articles.title: Singapore boasts 6 spots on World's 50 Best Bars 2021 list - CNA
articles.description: London's Connaught Bar is the world's best, while Jigger & Pony is Singapore's only entry in the Top 10 at No 9. Atlas lost its The Best Bar in Asia title, which it had held for two years.
articles.content:
Nightlife in Singapore may have quieted down during the pandemic but that hasnt stopped some of our local drinking establishments from topping the Worlds 50 Best Bars 2021 list.
